div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

p.em: Twin Rivers R10 Parents, Guardians, and Students:

Twin Rivers R10 along with other area schools will be extending our school cancellation period through May 1st, 2020. We will re-evaluate the situation closer to that date. This is in response to the COVID-19 virus and the president’s recommendation to practice social distancing through the end of April.

As we navigate these un-chartered waters we will be communicating with everyone through our school messaging system. As of now all TR students can get a meal at the Broseley nutrition center from 11-1230 each day Monday through Friday. There will also be drop off spots in Fisk and Qulin. Please contact your principal if you need food dropped at either end. This plan may change as we go forward so stay tuned. Please stay home if possible and always stay safe.

div.p: TIPS Reporting is for any student, staff, parent, or community member to report seeing something not appropriate or an act of kindness. Your reporting can be anonymous or not.
